MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KY15 postcode area of Cupar. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9am on Friday 2nd April to allow our engineers to safely return the network back to normal following repairs to an underground cable at Dalgairn and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 6:35 PM on Thursday, 01 April 2021.
